tiles.title: Safe Neighborhoods
tiles.description: Stay in areas like UWS, Midtown, or Brooklyn Heights for comfort and walkability.

tiles.title: Smart Transit Tips
tiles.description: Avoid empty subway cars, use rideshare late at night, and stick to main avenues.

tiles.title: Emergency Support
tiles.description: Know when to call 911, use 311, or step into a deli or caf√© for help.
